sentences.en: ‘Did you have a good journey?’ he said, trying to make conversation .
sentences.cn: “你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。

sentences.en: a telephone conversation
sentences.cn: 电话交谈

sentences.en: After a while, the conversation turned to a friend’s coming wedding.
sentences.cn: 过了一会儿，话题就转到一个朋友即将举行的婚礼上去了。

sentences.en: Alison and I had to prize conversation out of him.
sentences.cn: 我和艾莉森只得从他口中撬出谈话内容。

sentences.en: Because of her deafness she was hard to make conversation with.
sentences.cn: 因为她的耳聋，别人很难与她交谈。

sentences.en: Children quickly get bored by adult conversation.
sentences.cn: 儿童对成年人的谈话很快就会厌倦。

sentences.en: Francis felt he would like to stop this conversation in its tracks.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯觉得他应该立即打断这一谈话。

sentences.en: He appeared hardly capable of conducting a coherent conversation.
sentences.cn: 他好像连话都说不清楚。

sentences.en: He could hear snatches of conversation from across the room.
sentences.cn: 他从房间对面听得到零星的对话。

sentences.en: He re-ran in his mind his conversation with Smith.
sentences.cn: 他脑子里回顾了一遍他和史密斯的对话。

sentences.en: He was silent, no matter how hard Sofia tried to engage him in conversation .
sentences.cn: 无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。

sentences.en: I trailed her into Penney's and struck up a conversation.
sentences.cn: 我跟着她进了彭尼家然后开始交谈起来。

sentences.en: It’s impossible to carry on a conversation with all this noise in the background.
sentences.cn: 在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。

sentences.en: She had meant to make a discreet entrance, but conversation stopped dead.
sentences.cn: 她本打算悄悄进去，但谈话却突然中断了。

sentences.en: She was seen in animated conversation with the singer Yuri Marusin.
sentences.cn: 有人看见她与歌手尤里·马鲁辛交谈甚欢。

sentences.en: The conversation revolved around the terrible condition of the road.
sentences.cn: 这次对话主要讨论这条路的糟糕路况。

sentences.en: The conversation was drowned by the arrival of the taxi.
sentences.cn: 到来的出租车的声音压过了谈话的声音。

sentences.en: The piano music mixes with the murmur of conversation.
sentences.cn: 钢琴的弹奏声混杂着低低的交谈声。

sentences.en: The weather is a constant topic of conversation in Britain.
sentences.cn: 在英国，天气是交谈中永恒的话题。

sentences.en: There was a general hum of conversation around them.
sentences.cn: 他们周围的人都在嗡嗡地低声交谈。

sentences.en: They had a short conversation in German and seemed to be disagreeing about something.
sentences.cn: 他们用德语说了一会儿，好像对什么事有分歧。

sentences.en: They were deep in conversation , relaxed and smiling.
sentences.cn: 他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。

sentences.en: They were deep in conversation, relaxed and smiling.

sentences.en: When they were in company she always seemed to dominate the conversation.
sentences.cn: 他们在一起的时候，她好像总是操纵着话语权。

sentences.en: You can hardly expect scintillating conversation from a kid that age.
sentences.cn: 你几乎想不到那么点儿的孩子会说出妙趣横生的话来。
